metadata.title: CVE-2016-8705 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in process_bin_update function in Memcached,which is responsible for processing multiple commands of Memcached binaryprotocol, can be abused to cause heap overflow and lead to remote codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8705` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.4.25-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.25-2ubuntu1.2').
